title: Designing Engagement-Promoting Strategies for Online Accounting Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental accounting knowledge and digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Engagement strategies utilizing synchronous/asynchronous channels in real-time online environments are needed for adult learners with advanced accounting knowledge

learning_goals: Learners actively participate in discussions and practical exercises at least three times per week using synchronous/asynchronous channels.
Learners complete and submit team-based accounting case analyses using online collaboration tools.
Learners achieve an 80% or higher task improvement rate through real-time feedback sessions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
